name: Chatwing
tag_list: chat, chat-software, live-chat-software, chat-widget, chat-box, website-chat, blog-chat, free-website-chat, free-chat-box, chatbox
overview:
Chatwing is 100% free live chat software for any blog or website. It can be used by any site as a live chat widget. Websites and bloggers have the ability to embed Chatwing into their site or embed a live chat button.

Social Features: Chatwing offers users the ability to login with Facebook, Twitter, or as a Guest. User can also “share” and “tweet” live chat content directly to Facebook and Twitter. See real-time online number of users and click direct to user Facebook and Twitter profiles.

Admin Features: -Website and Blog admins have the ability to Live Delete messages on the fly. -Create word filters -Seamlessly create additional Chatwing boxes in your account -Control size and width of Chatbox on your site from Chatwing admin

Chatwing Chatbox Features:

-live user interaction for your visitors -website owner can talk to members live -100% free, Chatwing hosts all the chats -takes 1 minute to implement, few lines of code is given to you instantly -just enter domain name and email on http://chatwing.com/signup and that is it!

How to get Chatwing in 4 steps:

  1. Enter your site domain and email address here: http://chatwing.com/signup
  2. Next page, choose the color and the size which is suitable for your website or blog and click Submit
  3. Instantly get the html code.
  4. Embed the html code to your site Thats it! Now you have Chatwing live chat on your site.
